title: Serif font / Raven
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419021745im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KARTHOIZ_5874.jpg)

Font: 

 Baskerville 10 Pro 

Solved By: 

 [R.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419021745/http:/typophile.com/user/57325 "View user profile.")
author: Emma-L

comments.content: This looks to me like [Baskerville 10 Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419021745/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/storm_type_foundry/baskerville_10_pro_regular/ot_ps?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=65&sample_text=B%C4%9Bla%20Kol%C3%A1%C5%99ov%C3%A1&ft=liga) by František Štorm. I think it is nice to see that they apparently picked a Czech digitisation of a British typeface for announcing the exhibition of a Czech artist in Britain.
